SEARCH

Package org.apache.sis.coverage

package org.apache.sis.coverage
Functions that associates positions within a bounded space (its domain) to values (its range). This package makes no assumption on the domain geometry; it is not necessarily a grid. For the most common case — a coverage backed by a regular grid (also called "raster") — see org​.apache​.sis​.coverage​.grid.
Since:
1.0

Defined in the sis-feature module

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.sis.coverage.grid
    A coverage backed by a regular grid.
  • Class
    Description
    BandedCoverage
    A coverage where all sample values at a given location can be provided in an array of primitive type.
    BandedCoverage.Evaluator
    Computes or interpolates values of sample dimensions at given positions.
    CannotEvaluateException
    Thrown when a quantity can not be evaluated.
    Category
    Describes a sub-range of sample values in a sample dimension.
    IllegalSampleDimensionException
    Thrown when Sample­Dimension cannot be created.
    MismatchedCoverageRangeException
    Thrown when the number of bands or sample dimensions specified to a method is not equal to the number expected by a coverage.
    PointOutsideCoverageException
    Thrown when an evaluate method is invoked for a location outside the domain of the coverage.
    RegionOfInterest
    Region of interest (ROI) for an operation to apply on a coverage.
    SampleDimension
    Describes the data values in a coverage (the range).
    SampleDimension.Builder
    A mutable builder for creating an immutable Sample­Dimension.
    SubspaceNotSpecifiedException
    Thrown when an operation can only be applied on a subspace of a multi-dimensional coverage, but not such subspace has been specified.
